metadata.script_title: Project Management Is Dead: Why AI Agents Killed the PM Playbook

visual_prompts.description: Montage of PM tools - Asana, Monday, Jira, Notion
visual_prompts.context: Everyone thinks they need better project management skills. Better tools. Better templates. Better discipline.

runway.prompt: Cinematic b-roll: Montage of PM tools - Asana, Monday, Jira, Notion. Professional lighting, smooth camera movement, 4K quality, color graded

kling.prompt: Photorealistic scene: Montage of PM tools - Asana, Monday, Jira, Notion. Natural lighting, camera movement, high detail, cinematic framing

pika.prompt: Punchy b-roll: Montage of PM tools - Asana, Monday, Jira, Notion. High energy, vibrant colors, quick motion, social media optimized

real_footage.notes: Abstract concept 'Montage of PM tools - Asana, Monday, Jira, Notion' works better with AI visualization

heygen.script_text: Everyone thinks they need better project management skills. Better tools. Better templates. Better discipline.
heygen.notes: Use for intro, key points, transitions

visual_prompts.context: But here's what nobody tells you—that's not actually the problem.

kling.prompt: Photorealistic scene: All tools disappearing. Natural lighting, camera movement, high detail, cinematic framing

pika.prompt: Modern app interface: All tools disappearing. Vibrant colors, fast transitions, mobile-first design, eye-catching

real_footage.notes: Abstract concept 'All tools disappearing' works better with AI visualization

heygen.script_text: But here's what nobody tells you—that's not actually the problem.
heygen.notes: Use for intro, key points, transitions

visual_prompts.context: The problem isn't your skills. It's that you're trying to BE a project manager instead of BUILDING one. I'll show you how to create a system that manages 34 projects while you sleep.

runway.prompt: Sleek digital dashboard: Dashboard running autonomously overnight. Modern UI, glowing elements, dark theme, cinematic lighting, shallow depth of field

kling.prompt: Realistic tech environment: Dashboard running autonomously overnight. Modern office setting, actual screens displaying data, natural lighting, professional workspace

pika.prompt: Modern app interface: Dashboard running autonomously overnight. Vibrant colors, fast transitions, mobile-first design, eye-catching

real_footage.notes: Shows actual working system, builds trust

heygen.script_text: The problem isn't your skills. It's that you're trying to BE a project manager instead of BUILDING one. I'll show you how to create a system that manages 34 projects while you sleep.
heygen.notes: Use for intro, key points, transitions

visual_prompts.context: But more importantly, I'll show you why the entire discipline of project management is becoming obsolete.
